languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} внимательно смотрит на вас своими странными переливающимися глазами, а затем медленно кивает.{/n} "Да будет так. Я найду провидцев, и вместе мы покинем капкан из стальных терний, коим оказалась Комморра. Дождись нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} внимательно смотрит на вас своими странными переливающимися глазами, а затем медленно кивает.{/n} "Да будет так. Я найду провидцев, и вместе мы покинем капкан из стальных терний, коим оказалась Комморра. Дождись нас".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} внимательно смотрит на вас своими странными переливающимися глазами, а затем медленно кивает.{/n} "Да будет так. Я найду провидцев, и вместе мы покинем капкан из стальных терний, коим оказалась Комморра. Дождись нас".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} te mira cautelosamente con sus extraños y brillantes ojos, y luego asiente lentamente con la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea. Buscaré a los videntes, y luego nos marcharemos de la trampa de aceradas púas que ha resultado ser Commorragh. Espéranos».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} te mira cautelosamente con sus extraños y brillantes ojos, y luego asiente lentamente con la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea. Buscaré a los videntes, y luego nos marcharemos de la trampa de aceradas púas que ha resultado ser Commorragh. Espéranos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}その{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は奇妙に輝く目であなたを注意深く見つめ、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「そうしよう。我は先見司たちを見つける。その後はコモラフという鋼鉄の棘に覆われた罠から共に脱出しよう。待っていてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}その{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は奇妙に輝く目であなたを注意深く見つめ、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「そうしよう。我は先見司たちを見つける。その後はコモラフという鋼鉄の棘に覆われた罠から共に脱出しよう。待っていてくれ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}伊莉耶特认真地看着你，怪异的眼睛闪闪发亮，随后慢慢点了点头。{/n}“那就这样吧。我会找到那些先知，之后，我们一起离开科摩罗这个死亡陷阱。记得等我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}伊莉耶特认真地看着你，怪异的眼睛闪闪发亮，随后慢慢点了点头。{/n}“那就这样吧。我会找到那些先知，之后，我们一起离开科摩罗这个死亡陷阱。记得等我们。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} vous regarde attentivement avec ses étranges yeux scintillants, puis acquiesce lentement.{/n} « Soit. Je trouverai les Grands Prophètes et ensemble, nous quitterons le piège d'acier que s'est avérée être Commorragh. Attendez-nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} vous regarde attentivement avec ses étranges yeux scintillants, puis acquiesce lentement.{/n} « Soit. Je trouverai les Grands Prophètes et ensemble, nous quitterons le piège d'acier que s'est avérée être Commorragh. Attendez-nous. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} mustert dich mit ihren seltsam schimmernden Augen und nickt dann langsam.{/n} "So sei es. Ich werde die Runenpropheten finden und dann werde wir die stählern-dornige Schlinge, die Commorragh geworden ist, gemeinsam verlassen. Wartet auf uns."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} mustert dich mit ihren seltsam schimmernden Augen und nickt dann langsam.{/n} "So sei es. Ich werde die Runenpropheten finden und dann werde wir die stählern-dornige Schlinge, die Commorragh geworden ist, gemeinsam verlassen. Wartet auf uns."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}; ışıldayan, tuhaf gözleriyle sana dikkatlice bakıp ardından hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Peki o hâlde, Ötesezenleri bulacağım. Commorragh'ın dönüştüğü bu ayı kapanını hep beraber ardımızda bırakacağız. Bizi bekle."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks at you carefully with her strange, shimmering eyes, then nods slowly.{/n} "So be it. I will find the Farseers, and together we will leave the steel-thorned snare that Commorragh has turned out to be. Wait for us."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, sana ışıldayan tuhaf gözleriyle dikkatlice bakıyor. Ardından hafifçe başını eğiyor.{/n} "Peki o hâlde, Ötesezenleri bulacağım. Commorragh'ın dönüştüğü bu ayı kapanını hep beraber ardımızda bırakacağız. Bizi bekle."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
